lyrics:
5 contributorssister psychic lyricschorus
sister psychic wont you tell me does it ever get better
can you really see the future or just predict the weather
are we in our finest hour or headed for disaster
use your superpowers and rescue me

verse 1
we were there at the start weve got polaroids to prove it
skateboards and scars and embarrassing home movies
but if you really wanna see where its all going
switch on your tv shes alltelling allknowing

prechorus 1
she knows everything

chorus
sister psychic wont you tell me does it ever get better
can you really see the future or just predict the weather
are we in our finest hour or headed for disaster
use your superpowers and rescue me

verse 2
can you help us find the ones on the missing posters
is my baby being true am i doin what im supposed to
could you help me find my keys or better yet lifes meaning
are those tarot or dialogue cards that youre reading
see smash mouth liveget tickets as low as 56you might also likeprechorus 2
cmon tell me everything

chorus
sister psychic wont you tell me does it ever get better
can you really see the future or just predict the weather
are we in our finest hour or headed for disaster
use your superpower

postchorus
super power activate

verse 3
sister why would i tell you my deepest dark secrets
so you can take my diary and rip it all to pieces
just 695 for the very first minute
i think you won the lottery thats my prediction

prechorus 3
you know everything

chorus
sister psychic wont you tell me does it ever get better
can you really see the future or just predict the weather
are we in our finest hour or headed for disaster
use your superpowers and rescue me
chorus
sister psychic wont you tell me does it ever get better
can you really see the future or just predict the weather
are we in our finest hour or headed for disaster
use your superpowers and rescue meembed
